title: Black Alistar
body:
Well, I think its time to make this Skin Available...  {{champion:12}} 

Anyone?

replies.body: after the visual rework, its BY FUUUUUUUCKING FAR his best skin and it should be permanently available

> [{quoted}](name=KUNSTFEHLA,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=P5a4Xolg,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-20T19:47:53.580+0000)
>
> after the visual rework, its BY FUUUUUUUCKING FAR his best skin and it should be permanently available

honestly when they do updates like this it should be at least made available for a small amount of time. I agree now with the update it looks much better than it did in the past. Never quite understood why they would even do a skin update especially for a skin like this that probably less than 1% of the player based even owns!

well they made a model update so all skins have to get updated or they wouldnt fit the model anymore. but as i said and as you repeated and as i totally agree with: once they visually update a champion, they should make ALL (even legacy or limited or whatever bullshit) skins available for a duration.

I think alot of the limited skins should be made available again.
I want King rammus and Black alistar.

i think the main problem with alistar is that his best skins (classic and hell alistar or whatever his name is) look bad now. like, his classic skin was amazing before the update but now its ugly. 

thats why i think once they visually update a champion, they should make all skins for the champion available at least for some time.
Sadly that is the difference between Limited and Legacy.  Limited skins will never come back.

Hey Godzillion,

Skins like Black Alistar and Human Ryze were awarded to players who preordered the Collector's Edition of League of Legends.  At this time we don't have plans to make these skins available for purchase, or by other means.
